title: The Witch Of Ice And Snow Has No Time For ××
alternative_title: 氷雪の魔女は××している場合ではない。 ; hyōsetsu no majo wakakerukakeru shiteiru baai de wa nai.
status: 氷雪の魔女は××している場合ではない。 ; hyōsetsu no majo wakakerukakeru shiteiru baai de wa nai.
description:
Description :
        To become a witch, you must be willing to pay the price...Iveta became a witch, but it cost parts of her body turning to ice. If she gets too close to heat, she might just melt away! She doesn't think there's anything wrong with her, but when she comes into contact with her courier, Sosuke, her body starts to throb!? Could this feeling be fatal?!
